item.title: Halp plz
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

the npcdrop class file…right click and edit. for massing…add an autokicker using the actiontimer though this doesnt work on some sources…and for the run up to attack thing…set it to where you are required to be within 1 coord x and y for attack to be successful. otherwise itll say something like must be closer. LOL ive told you what you need to do but you need to learn how on your own.

Read full topic
